table.title: TCP AUX Cascaded Retimer Topology Notes

entry.p: No explicit limit, use best known routing practices.
Reference planes can be continuous ground or continuous power that have low frequency peak to peak noise. Ground referencing is preferred.
Refer to USB4 ESD approved list in Barlow Ridge Host Router (BR HR) collateral.
Nominal 100 nF recommended (75 nF to 200 nF including tolerance).
An edge rate reduction mechanism such as a 47 pF capacitor (Cs) terminated to VSS is recommended. Cs cap is optional.
